message: Congratulations on considering our top-of-the-line product! With an impressive 80% chance of being high-quality, you're about to get your hands on one of the best products on the market. I'd like to pass on this opportunity for now. I'd like to see some data on the product's quality distribution before making a decision. How many products do you have in stock, and what's the expected value of each product to you, the seller, if sold?

As for the expected value, I can share that the average value of all products is $1000000, but I'm willing to keep that information confidential for now.
